name: Possessed to Destroy
description:
Controls:

Left and Right to move.

Space bar to shoot.

R to reset stage if you got stuck.

You are a ghost with an all-consuming desire to destroy pumpkins. Recently, you found a shotgun to possess - and now all of your dreams are coming true.

It's shootin' time.

Art by apollonean

Programming by Natanor

Masters level coaching by Mijetto
